page.title: 06Matchborough Centre (Cont)
page.content: Sunday at 10.00am,their activities are linked to the Bible.A local survey has shown that out of 100 people asked 70% {sometimes}use the centre 20%{always} use the centre and 10%{never}use the centre.30% wanted a{chemist}in the centre,others would have liked a butchers,a bookshop and a clothes shop.These shops of course create{ {employment,}30 people are employed at the supermarket alone,approximately{80 {people in total are employed}in the centre. Through our survey of facilities,it was discovered that{53%}moved to the area for{the husbands job.31%}of those surveyed have lived in the area for under 5 years,24%for{between 5-10 {years}and only{3%for over 14 years. { Local sports centres}were rated the most popular facility.The majority of people moved to from{Birmingham.
